com.github.jonathanxd.iutils.reflection

Interface Link<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Result type of invocation of the element.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BindLink<U,T>, NamedBindLink<U,T>, NamedLink<T>

    public interface Link<T>
    Represents a link to a invokable element.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <U> BindLink<U,T> bind(U instance)
      Binds a instance to invocation.
      T invoke(java.lang.Object... args)
      Invokes the linked invokable element.

    • Method Detail

      • bind

        <U> BindLink<U,T> bind(U instance)
        Binds a instance to invocation. This method will not check if the target element requires a instance.
        Type Parameters:
        U - Type of instance.
        Parameters:
        instance - Instance to bind.
        Returns:
        A link with the instance bind-ed.

      • invoke

        T invoke(java.lang.Object... args)
        Invokes the linked invokable element. If this is not a BindLink and the linked invokable element is a instance element, the first argument should be the instance (or you can bind the instance using bind(Object)).
        Parameters:
        args - Arguments to pass to the invokable element.
        Returns:
        Result of invocation.
